'''Dave Fennoy''' is an American voice actor, known for his close working relationship with [[Telltale Games]]. Among his roles at the company include {{Wikipedia|Lee Everett}} in ''{{Wikipedia|The Walking Dead (video game)|The Walking Dead}}'', [https://borderlands.fandom.com/wiki/Finch Finch] from ''{{Wikipedia|Tales from the Borderlands}}'', and {{Wikipedia|Lucius Fox}} in ''{{Wikipedia|Batman: The Telltale Series}}''. Outside of video games, he is known for voicing [https://ben10.fandom.com/wiki/Tetrax_Shard_(Classic) Tetrax] in the ''{{Wikipedia|Ben 10}}'' franchise.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2015, Fennoy was cast as {{MCSM|Gabriel the Warrior}} in {{MCSM}}.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.facebook.com/share/p/1EqWXLaWAz/|title=Announced today... A new Minecraft game coming soon that I'm proud to have a part in.|author=Dave Fennoy|website=Facebook|date=July 4, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.vg247.com/minecraft-story-mode-trailer-patton-oswalt-cast|title=Minecraft: Story mode trailer introduces Patton Oswalt-led cast|author=Brenna Hillier|website=VG247|date=July 5, 2015}}</ref> A brave warrior known for his tenure in the {{MCSM|Order of the Stone}}, Gabriel's role in the story can drastically change depending on the player's choices.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.facebook.com/share/183Ts89k9v/|title=I so wish I could have been there for the another great Telltale project that I have the great pleasure of being a part of.|author=Dave Fennoy|website=Facebook|date=October 13, 2015}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Prior to being cast in ''Story Mode'', one of Fennoy's characters, Lee Everett, received an official skin in [[Skin Pack 5]].<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.facebook.com/share/p/19oLWuWEn8/|title=Cast of The Walking Dead: The Game headed to Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition this week via Skin Pack 5!|author=Job Stauffer|website=Facebook|date=July 29, 2013}}</ref>
